structure.unit: A JUDICIAL SUPPORT AGENCIES AND PERSONNEL

law.catch_line: Sentencing level relating to probation or other nonimposition of sentence.
law.text:
The sentencing level of the system shall consist of at least the following information in regard to probation or other nonimposition of the sentence:
List separately any conviction for which sentence was imposed but was probated, suspended, or otherwise not imposed;
Was probation or nonimposition of the sentence conditioned in any manner:
List the conditions; and
What is the method of monitoring compliance with the conditions;
If a portion of a fine or other cost was probated or otherwise not imposed:
List for each offense the amount of the fine not imposed; and
List for each offense the amount of court costs or other costs or fees not imposed;
If a sentence of imprisonment was not imposed or a portion thereof was not imposed:
List the offense, the sentence, and the amount not imposed; and
If return to confinement or other imprisonment was a condition of nonimposition of a sentence, list the conditions thereof.
law.history: Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 389, sec. 17, effective July 15, 1986.
